channel.title: Papers with Code: Latest (unofficial)
channel.description: As a disclaimer, this is an unofficial feed and has no affiliation with Papers with Code.

item.title: Auxiliary-Tasks Learning for Physics-Informed Neural Network-Based Partial Differential Equations Solving
item.description: To alleviate these issues, we proposed auxiliary-task learning-based physics-informed neural networks (ATL-PINNs), which provide four different auxiliary-task learning modes and investigate their performance compared with original PINNs.

item.title: SoK: Comparing Different Membership Inference Attacks with a Comprehensive Benchmark
item.description: We have identified three principles for the proposed "comparing different MI attacks" methodology, and we have designed and implemented the MIBench benchmark with 84 evaluation scenarios for each dataset.

item.title: Correlation-Aware Mutual Learning for Semi-supervised Medical Image Segmentation
item.description: Our approach is based on a mutual learning strategy that incorporates two modules: the Cross-sample Mutual Attention Module (CMA) and the Omni-Correlation Consistency Module (OCC).

item.title: Rhythm Modeling for Voice Conversion
item.description: Voice conversion aims to transform source speech into a different target voice.

item.title: Locally Adaptive Federated Learning via Stochastic Polyak Stepsizes
item.description: We prove that FedSPS converges linearly in strongly convex and sublinearly in convex settings when the interpolation condition (overparametrization) is satisfied, and converges to a neighborhood of the solution in the general case.

item.title: BiRP: Learning Robot Generalized Bimanual Coordination using Relative Parameterization Method on Human Demonstration
item.description: We demonstrate the method using synthetic motions and human demonstration data and deploy it to a humanoid robot to perform a generalized bimanual coordination motion.

item.title: Provably Faster Gradient Descent via Long Steps
item.description: This work establishes provably faster convergence rates for gradient descent via a computer-assisted analysis technique.

item.title: Reconstructing Spatiotemporal Data with C-VAEs
item.description: Existing region interpolation methods often fail to generate smooth and realistic representations of a region's evolution.

item.title: Contrastive Learning for Conversion Rate Prediction
item.description: To tailor the contrastive learning task to the CVR prediction problem, we propose embedding masking (EM), rather than feature masking, to create two views of augmented samples.

item.title: Sem-CS: Semantic CLIPStyler for Text-Based Image Style Transfer
item.description: However, the ground semantics of objects in the style transfer output is lost due to style spill-over on salient and background objects (content mismatch) or over-stylization.

item.title: Deep learning-based estimation of whole-body kinematics from multi-view images
item.description: It is necessary to analyze the whole-body kinematics (including joint locations and joint angles) to assess risks of fatal and musculoskeletal injuries in occupational tasks.

item.title: FreeSeed: Frequency-band-aware and Self-guided Network for Sparse-view CT Reconstruction
item.description: Specifically, we first propose a frequency-band-aware artifact modeling network (FreeNet), which learns artifact-related frequency-band attention in Fourier domain for better modeling the globally distributed streak artifact on the sparse-view CT images.

item.title: Mini-Batch Optimization of Contrastive Loss
item.description: Contrastive learning has gained significant attention as a method for self-supervised learning.

item.title: Towards Safe Self-Distillation of Internet-Scale Text-to-Image Diffusion Models
item.description: Large-scale image generation models, with impressive quality made possible by the vast amount of data available on the Internet, raise social concerns that these models may generate harmful or copyrighted content.

item.title: On the Importance of Denoising when Learning to Compress Images
item.description: Image noise is ubiquitous in photography.

item.title: DSSE: a drone swarm search environment
item.description: The Drone Swarm Search project is an environment, based on PettingZoo, that is to be used in conjunction with multi-agent (or single-agent) reinforcement learning algorithms.

item.title: TreeFormer: a Semi-Supervised Transformer-based Framework for Tree Counting from a Single High Resolution Image
item.description: Automatic tree density estimation and counting using single aerial and satellite images is a challenging task in photogrammetry and remote sensing, yet has an important role in forest management.

item.title: GLA-GCN: Global-local Adaptive Graph Convolutional Network for 3D Human
item.description: As such, we concentrate on improving the 3D human pose lifting via ground truth data for the future improvement of more quality estimated pose data.

item.title: CellGAN: Conditional Cervical Cell Synthesis for Augmenting Cytopathological Image Classification
item.description: In this paper, we propose CellGAN to synthesize cytopathological images of various cervical cell types for augmenting patch-level cell classification.

item.title: The IMPTC Dataset: An Infrastructural Multi-Person Trajectory and Context Dataset
item.description: In addition, to enable the entire stack of research capabilities, the dataset includes all data, starting from the sensor-, calibration- and detection data until trajectory and context data.

item.title: PID-Inspired Inductive Biases for Deep Reinforcement Learning in Partially Observable Control Tasks
item.description: When this is the case, the policy needs to leverage the history of observations to infer the current state.

item.title: Rethinking Mitosis Detection: Towards Diverse Data and Feature Representation
item.description: And the feature diversity is preserved by inter- and intra- class feature diversity-preserved module (InCDP).

item.title: DDNAS: Discretized Differentiable Neural Architecture Search for Text Classification
item.description: Neural Architecture Search (NAS) has shown promising capability in learning text representation.

item.title: MMBench: Is Your Multi-modal Model an All-around Player?
item.description: In response to these challenges, we propose MMBench, a novel multi-modality benchmark.

item.title: Ashaar: Automatic Analysis and Generation of Arabic Poetry Using Deep Learning Approaches
item.description: Poetry holds immense significance within the cultural and traditional fabric of any nation.

item.title: Rectifying Noisy Labels with Sequential Prior: Multi-Scale Temporal Feature Affinity Learning for Robust Video Segmentation
item.description: Therefore, Temporal Feature Affinity Learning (TFAL) is devised to indicate possible noisy labels by evaluating the affinity between pixels in two adjacent frames.

item.title: Pluggable Neural Machine Translation Models via Memory-augmented Adapters
item.description: Although neural machine translation (NMT) models perform well in the general domain, it remains rather challenging to control their generation behavior to satisfy the requirement of different users.

item.title: BLUEX: A benchmark based on Brazilian Leading Universities Entrance eXams
item.description: One common trend in recent studies of language models (LMs) is the use of standardized tests for evaluation.

item.title: Epidemic Modeling with Generative Agents
item.description: This study offers a new paradigm of individual-level modeling to address the grand challenge of incorporating human behavior in epidemic models.

item.title: Duncode Characters Shorter
item.description: It discusses local encoders such as ASCII and GB-2312, which encode specific characters into shorter bytes, and universal encoders like UTF-8 and UTF-16, which can encode the complete Unicode set with greater space requirements and are gaining widespread acceptance.

item.title: Mao-Zedong At SemEval-2023 Task 4: Label Represention Multi-Head Attention Model With Contrastive Learning-Enhanced Nearest Neighbor Mechanism For Multi-Label Text Classification
item.description: The study of human values is essential in both practical and theoretical domains.

item.title: Benchmarking Algorithms for Federated Domain Generalization
item.description: We then apply our methodology to evaluate 13 Federated DG methods, which include centralized DG methods adapted to the FL context, FL methods that handle client heterogeneity, and methods designed specifically for Federated DG.

item.title: Uncertainty Quantification of the Virial Black Hole Mass with Conformal Prediction
item.description: In contrast to baseline approaches for prediction interval estimation, we show that the CQR method provides prediction intervals that adjust to the black hole mass and its related properties.

item.title: Differentiable Forward Projector for X-ray Computed Tomography
item.description: Data-driven deep learning has been successfully applied to various computed tomographic reconstruction problems.

item.title: PKU-GoodsAD: A Supermarket Goods Dataset for Unsupervised Anomaly Detection and Segmentation
item.description: It follows the unsupervised setting and only normal (defect-free) images are used for training.

item.title: A stochastic optimization approach to minimize robust density power-based divergences for general parametric density models
item.description: Density power divergence (DPD) [Basu et al. (1998), Biometrika], designed to estimate the underlying distribution of the observations robustly, comprises an integral term of the power of the parametric density models to be estimated.

item.title: Conformalization of Sparse Generalized Linear Models
item.description: Given a sequence of observable variables $\{(x_1, y_1), \ldots, (x_n, y_n)\}$, the conformal prediction method estimates a confidence set for $y_{n+1}$ given $x_{n+1}$ that is valid for any finite sample size by merely assuming that the joint distribution of the data is permutation invariant.

item.title: Relational Extraction on Wikipedia Tables using Convolutional and Memory Networks
item.description: Relation extraction (RE) is the task of extracting relations between entities in text.

item.title: Responses of Unemployment to Productivity Changes for a General Matching Technology
item.description: For a canonical DMP model, I (1) demonstrate that a unique steady-state equilibrium will exist as long as the initial vacancy yields a positive surplus; (2) characterize responses of unemployment to productivity changes for a general matching technology; and (3) show how a matching technology that is not Cobb--Douglas implies unemployment responds more to productivity changes, which is independent of resources available for job creation, a feature that will be of interest to business-cycle researchers.

item.title: Geometric Neural Diffusion Processes
item.description: In this work, we extend the framework of diffusion models to incorporate a series of geometric priors in infinite-dimension modelling.

item.title: Generative Contrastive Graph Learning for Recommendation
item.description: Second, feature augmentation imposes the same scale noise augmentation on each node, which neglects the unique characteristics of nodes on the graph.

item.title: Differential Analysis of Triggers and Benign Features for Black-Box DNN Backdoor Detection
item.description: Having the computed five metrics, five novelty detectors are trained from the validation dataset.

item.title: Domain-Agnostic Neural Architecture for Class Incremental Continual Learning in Document Processing Platform
item.description: Production deployments in complex systems require ML architectures to be highly efficient and usable against multiple tasks.

item.title: Synthetic Dataset for Evaluating Complex Compositional Knowledge for Natural Language Inference
item.description: To this end, we modify the original texts using a set of phrases - modifiers that correspond to universal quantifiers, existential quantifiers, negation, and other concept modifiers in Natural Logic (NL) (MacCartney, 2009).

item.title: U-CREAT: Unsupervised Case Retrieval using Events extrAcTion
item.description: To further promote research in PCR, in this paper, we propose a new large benchmark (in English) for the PCR task: IL-PCR (Indian Legal Prior Case Retrieval) corpus.

item.title: Co-Attention Gated Vision-Language Embedding for Visual Question Localized-Answering in Robotic Surgery
item.description: Therefore, a surgical Visual Question Localized-Answering (VQLA) system would be helpful for medical students and junior surgeons to learn and understand from recorded surgical videos.

item.title: One-Versus-Others Attention: Scalable Multimodal Integration
item.description: Multimodal learning models have become increasingly important as they surpass single-modality approaches on diverse tasks ranging from question-answering to autonomous driving.

item.title: ISLTranslate: Dataset for Translating Indian Sign Language
item.description: To the best of our knowledge, it is the largest translation dataset for continuous Indian Sign Language.

item.title: Unleashing Cognitive Synergy in Large Language Models: A Task-Solving Agent through Multi-Persona Self-Collaboration
item.description: Human intelligence thrives on the concept of cognitive synergy, where collaboration and information integration among different cognitive processes yield superior outcomes compared to individual cognitive processes in isolation.

item.title: On the Need for a Language Describing Distribution Shifts: Illustrations on Tabular Datasets
item.description: Different distribution shifts require different algorithmic and operational interventions.
